text: Hagi zamagrama etesanu'za Saioni agonafi mareri'za manine'za ranke hu'za kezati'za zagamera nehu'za musenkasea hugahaze. E'ina'ma hanazana Ra Anumzamo'ma knare'nare zantamima witima, wainima, olivi masavema, sipisipine, bulimakao afu kevumo'zama anenta'ma ante hakarema hanaza zanku'ene hu'za musena hugahaze. Ana hanigeno nomaniza zamimo'a mago'ma masaventretre'ma hu'nea hozagna hanige'za, mago'enena zamasunku zampina omanigahaze.
